content.text:
I don't have the ability to search the web. I can only execute bash commands in a sandboxed environment and work with files in a local project repository.

However, I can provide you with the answer based on my training data: The last US penny minted for circulation was in **2022**. The most recent year pennies were minted was 2022, though the US Mint has continued to produce pennies in small quantities for collectors.

If you need the exact date in yyyy-mm-dd format, the US Mint typically completes coin production in late fall, but I don't have access to the precise date of the final penny minted. To get an accurate date, you would need to check the US Mint's official website or historical records.
